text: The Sir Seewoosagur Ramgoolam International Airport (short name: SSR Airport) is the biggest airport in Mauritius. Before, it was known as Plaisance Airport. == Location == The SSR Airport is near the city Mahebourg in Mauritius. It is also the only big airport in this country. Category:Mauritius Category:Airports in Africa
title: Sir Seewoosagur Ramgoolam International Airport
